name: Murder at PARTY ISLAND
description:
A simple ethical choice to play with. After all, there's no consequences on Party Island!

Didn't think I had time for this jam, but did have Sunday... so here's my game in a day that can be played in 3 minutes. Pics from Unsplash.

I really want to make a full length game on this sort of theme, in the vein of Zero Escape but less pervy.
